original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US officials, including Vice President J.D. Vance, Secretary of State Marco Rubio, and presidential envoy Steve Witkoff, are leading efforts to expedite a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukraine's Vladimir Zelensky, as announced by the White House. The aim is to resolve the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict. Meanwhile, Israel has launched an operation to take over Gaza City, aiming for full control, with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordering a shortened timeline for the defeat of Hamas.</s>
